languages.text: "Этот скучный мон-кай? Хотя, если я начну с его зверя, он подарит мне незабываемый букет страданий".

traits.locale_text: "Самая пикантная боль — та, что настаивается годами железной выдержки. Идеальный коктейль ненависти и отчаяния".

languages.text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."
languages.original_text: "Этот скучный мон-кай? Хотя, если я начну с его зверя, он подарит мне незабываемый букет страданий".

traits.locale_text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."
"That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."
"That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."
"That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."
"That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."

languages.text: "Dieser langweilige Chem-Pan-Sey? Wenn ich mit seinem Köter anfange, gewährt er mir gewiss ein unvergessliches Bouquet an Kummer."
languages.original_text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser langweilige Chem-Pan-Sey? Wenn ich mit seinem Köter anfange, gewährt er mir gewiss ein unvergessliches Bouquet an Kummer."

languages.text: « Ce mon-keigh insipide ? Cela dit, si je commence par son animal, il m'offrira un inoubliable festin de désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."

traits.locale_text: « Ce mon-keigh insipide ? Cela dit, si je commence par son animal, il m'offrira un inoubliable festin de désespoir. »

languages.text: “那只无聊的猴子吗？不过，如果我从他那头畜生开始动手，他想必会为我带来难忘的痛苦盛宴。”
languages.original_text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."

traits.locale_text: “那只无聊的猴子吗？不过，如果我从他那头畜生开始动手，他想必会为我带来难忘的痛苦盛宴。”

languages.text: «¿Ese mon-keigh insulso? Aunque, si empiezo con su bestia, me dará un buqué de miseria inolvidable».
languages.original_text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ese mon-keigh insulso? Aunque, si empiezo con su bestia, me dará un buqué de miseria inolvidable».

languages.text: 「あの退屈なモン＝ケイか？だが、奴の獣に手を出せば、忘れられない苦悶の花束を授けてくれるだろうよ」
languages.original_text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."

traits.locale_text: 「あの退屈なモン＝ケイか？だが、奴の獣に手を出せば、忘れられない苦悶の花束を授けてくれるだろうよ」

languages.text: "Şu sıkıcı mon-keigh mi? Gerçi onun hayvanıyla başlarsam bana unutulmaz bir sefalet buketi sunacaktır."
languages.original_text: "That boring mon-keigh? Though if I start with his beast, he will grant me an unforgettable bouquet of misery."

traits.locale_text: "Şu sıkıcı mon-keigh mi? Gerçi onun hayvanıyla başlarsam bana unutulmaz bir sefalet buketi sunacaktır."
